name: Mohawk-19
description:
Day 42 - Last month a deadly virus began navigating the world, turning ordinary humans into mindless floating heads. They relentlessly charge at the uninfected in an attempt to turn them... and there have been rumors of giant heads that can that's extra durable. 

The worst part? They've got a perfect mowhawk to go along with it! 

How dare this virus take something so pure as a mohawk and distort it into a sign of disease.

I've been forced into a quarantine due to my completely natural mohawk, but I won't let that stop me from slaughtering as many of these abominations as I can!

Gameplay:

The game is broken up into waves, with every 5th wave being a boss wave. You must gather resources from the respawning trees and rocks to construct additional py- I mean build turrets to help defend yourself. 

Controls:

  • Left/Right click on your mouse to pan the camera
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • 1-3 to select a turret to place
  • 'E' to place a turret or gather resources

Turrets:

  • Basic Turret
    • Cost: 1 Log, 1 Stone
    • Range: 30m
    • Damage: 1
    • Effect: None
  • Fire Turret
    • Cost: 2 Logs, 2 Stones
    • Range: 20m
    • Damage: 2
    • Effect: None
  • Ice Turret
    • Cost: 3 Logs, 3 Stones
    • Range: 20m
    • Damage: 1
    • Effect: Slows the enemy for 5 seconds, resetting on consecutive hits
